subject: junit - unit testing an EJB ClassCastException
msgSnippet: i know what everyone must be thinking...ClassCastException again! i am trying to unit test my EJB but i get this exception.  the application bombs on the
messageBody:
i know what everyone must be thinking...ClassCastException again!
i am trying to unit test my EJB but i get this exception. the
application bombs on the PortableRemoteObject.narrow( ) method.
anyone have any ideas on how to get rid of this?

i am using weblogic 5.1, visual cafe 4.1.

thanks,
mike
